name: Heavy load
description:
Loader - a working guy! And his work is much more complicated than it might seem!
There are situations when impossible tasks are put before him at first glance.
HEAVY LOAD is a puzzle in which you have to solve the problem of how to move the boxes so that they fall into the right places.
Fans of interesting logical tasks will be satisfied.


Features:
-40 levels
-Bright painting
-Slow gameplay
-Interesting gameplay
